meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ruta Larson Gordon Brown Bob Beers Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #840.

td.p: Ruta Larson, a financial assistance worker from Racine, Wisconsin
Gordon Brown, a retail executive from Roselle, New Jersey
Bob Beers, an attorney from Fairfax, Virginia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $23,000)

tr.td: ASTRONOMY
FOOTBALL
FASHION HISTORY
TRANSPORTATION
COUNTRY SONGS
THE SCENE IS SET

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
